response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am offering this exceptional item for $750,000. This is a special chance for you to own something truly remarkable and potentially increase its worth over time. I believe in the intrinsic value of this product and am confident it will meet or exceed your expectations. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or make an offer based on your valuation.", "product_price": 750000}
